formula: Lacunary e.g.f: x / (exp(x) - 1) + x / 2 = Sum_{k>=0} a(k) * x^(2*k) / ((2*k)! * (2*k + 1)!). - _Michael Somos_, Mar 29 2011
a(n) = determinant of the 2n X 2n matrix ( d(i,j) = binomial( i+1, i-j+2) if j < i+2 else 0 ). - _Michael Somos_, Oct 08 2003
